channel.title: robot on Joachim Weise
channel.description: Recent content in robot on Joachim Weise

item.title: Mobile Robot
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Joachim Weise)
item.description: For a quite some time I had planned to build my own small mobile robot. During the last weeks I ordered the components and played a little bit with an Arduino and ultrasonic distance sensors (as described in an earlier post). Now I have finally found the time to put the basic setup in place and go for a first test drive.

item.title: Ultrasonic Range Sensor on the Raspberry Pi
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Joachim Weise)
item.description: In this project I am interfacing the HC-SR04 ultrasonic sensor module to a Raspberry Pi to measure distance. Later on the Raspberry as well as the sensor will be part of an obstacle avoiding robot. I use my oscilloscope to check whether the sensor is working as announced.
